Class ec.plui.ECScaledImageListItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.ListItem
           |
           +----ec.plui.ECScaledImageListItem
public class ECScaledImageListItem
extends ListItem
A subclass of ListItem that draws an image proportionally scaled to fit in the item. The scaled image is drawn on the right side of the list item; it does not interfere with the image or selected image that ListItem handles.

ECScaledImageListItem()

drawInRect(Graphics, Rect)
Draws the scaled image on the right edge of the item, scaled to fit.
getScaledImage()
setScaledImage(Image)

  public ECScaledImageListItem()
